tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GeneExpressionData (
    gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_name VARCHAR(255),
    tissue_type VARCHAR(255),
    condition VARCHAR(255),
    expression_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE ExpressionData ( 
   data_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
   gene_id INT NOT NULL, 
   tissue_id INT NOT NULL, 
   condition_id INT NOT NULL, 
   expression_value FLOAT NOT NULL 
);
CREATE TABLE GeneExpressionData (   gene_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,   gene_name VARCHAR(255),   tissue_type VARCHAR(255),   expression_level FLOAT   );
CREATE TABLE TissueInfo (   tissue_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,   tissue_name VARCHAR(255),   description TEXT   );
CREATE TABLE ConditionData (   condition_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,   condition_name VARCHAR(255),   condition_description TEXT   );

CREATE TABLE GeneConditionMap (   gene_id UUID,   condition_id UUID,   FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES GeneExpressionData(gene_id),   FOREIGN KEY (condition_id) REFERENCES ConditionData(condition_id)   );

CREATE TABLE ExpressionData { 
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    gene_id INT NOT NULL, 
    tissue_id INT NOT NULL, 
    condition_id INT NOT NULL, 
    expression_level FLOAT NOT NULL, 
    FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES Gene(gene_id), 
    FOREIGN KEY (tissue_id) REFERENCES Tissue(tissue_id), 
    FOREIGN KEY (condition_id) REFERENCES Condition(condition_id) 
}
